TopicTitle: KSP crashing Steam in Big Picture?

Articles.Content:
So I was building a Munar Landing Craft on my TV using my Steam Controller/Link when my game crashed, no big deal.
Now, whenever I am using my Steam Link, if I try to load any save or make any new file (basically whenever the space center loads in?) I get stuck at a black screen with just the UI elements visible, and Steam (and/or Big Picture/KSP) crashes.
I verified game cache and reinstalled KSP, and the game works when I'm on my computer monitor, even in big picture, so the problem is isolated to the Steam Link?
Any help will be appreciated, fly safe all.

Hi Dissonant, please try [U][URL="https://support.steampowered.com/"]Steam support[/URL][/U] for issues with Steam, as Steam is provided by [U][URL="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valve_Corporation"]the Valve corporation[/URL][/U] and not by Squad, Squad just uses Valves platform to sell their game.

[U][URL="https://duckduckgo.com/?q=steam+big+picture+mode+crash&t=canonical"]A search[/URL][/U] shows this is not an issue only with KSP but [U][URL="http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?p=32857904"]with[/URL][/U] [U][URL="https://steamcommunity.com/groups/bigpicture/discussions/1/864980103791283696/"]many[/URL][/U] [URL="https://steamcommunity.com/discussions/forum/1/864961537275130365/"][U]other[/U][/URL] [U][URL="http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=3047328"]games[/URL][/U] too.

A Valve representative would be able to tell you where to find your Steam logs and help you pinpoint the cause of the problem.
